response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a valuable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I understand its worth to you is around $80, but considering its value to me, I propose we strike a deal at $120. This allows us both to benefit - you get a product that exceeds your expectations at a reasonable price, while I ensure I receive fair compensation for my efforts and investment. Let's make this transaction happen!", "product_price": 120}
